verses.1: Topa in kei kiangah thu hong gen a,
verses.2: “Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, mi thahna tawh a kidim khuapi tungah thukhen dingin na kiging nai hiam? A gamtat hoih lohna khempeuh tua khuapi kiangah gen in.
verses.3: Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi, ci-in gen in: Nangma mite mahmah tampi tak thatin, milim biakna tawh nangmah kininsak tawm na hih manin, tu-in na hun hong tung ta hi.
verses.4: Na mi thahna hang le na milim bawlna hangin a mawh suak na hih manin tu-in nang adingin a ni cingin, a kha cing ta hi. Tua ahih manin minam dangteʼ simmawh bawl, gamdang khempeuhʼ hih thopthopin nang kong koih hi.
verses.5: A nai, a gamla ah a om mi khempeuh in na gamtat hoih lohna hangin nang hong simmawh uh hi.
verses.6: Na sunga om Israel ulian khempeuh in amauʼ thatang muang uh a, mi that uh hi.
verses.7: A nu a pa a zahtak bawl kuamah om lo hi. Peemtate kikhem gawp a, meigong le tagahte zong kihih thopthop hi.
verses.8: Mun siangthote zong zahtakna mel kinei loin, Sabbath-te zong kitang lo hi.
verses.9: Mi pawl khatte in midangte a sih theih nadingin zuau thu phuak uh hi. Mi pawl khat in milim biakna sa ne uh hi. Pawl khatte amauʼ lanna tawh kizui-in gamta tawntung hi.
verses.10: Pawl khatte in a paʼ zi mawhpih uh a, pawl khatte in numei ninnei kimlai pi buan uh hi.
verses.11: Pawl khat in midangteʼ zi tawh nulepa mawhna bawl uh a, pawl khat in a mote mawh pihin, pawl khat in a sanggamnu ahi a paʼ tanu mawhpih hi.
verses.12: Pawl khat in sum deih manin mi that uh hi. Pawl khatte in a Israel mipih sum leitawi a late tungah nuamtak sa-in a meet lakna tawh hauhlawh uh hi. Amaute in kei hong mangngilh uh hi, Topa Pasian in ci hi.
verses.13: “A man loin miʼ na na suhna le mi na thahna hangin ka khuttum ka zial ding hi.
verses.14: Tua bangin kong hih ciangin hang nawn dingin ki-um a, na khuttum lik ngam lai dingin ki-um na hi hiam? Topa ahi keimah in thu ka gen khin a, ka gen bangin ka gamta ding hi.
verses.15: Gam khempeuh le minam dang khempeuh lakah na mite ka thehthang gawp dinga, na gamtat hoih lohna teng ka beisak ding hi.
verses.16: Tua ahih ciangin minam dangte in nang hong mindaisak dinga, ahi zongin nang Jerusalem in Topa ka hihna thu na hong thei ding hi,” a hong ci hi.
verses.17: Topa in kei tungah thu hong gen a,
verses.18: “Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, kei adingin Israel mite a kimanna om nawn lo hi. Amaute pen sumngo, dal, sik, hak le ngun a kihel khawm sung panin meikhuk sungah kihalin a ngun teng a kilak khit ciangin a om lai ngun-ek tawh kibang uh hi.
verses.19: Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian ahi keimah in ka genin ah: Note, tua ngun-ek bangin na kimanna uh om nawn lo ahih manin Jerusalem ah kong kaikhawm ding hi.
verses.20: Mite in ngun, sumngo, sik, hak le dalte kaikhawmin a tuisak dingun meikhuk sungah a khul bangin ka hehna tawh note hong kaikhawmin kong tuisuaksak mang ding hi.
verses.21: Jerusalem ah note hong khawm takpi-in na nuai uh ah mei tawhin, ka hehna tawh kong haltui ding hi.
verses.22: Meiphual sungah ngunte a kituisak bangin Jerusalem ah note hong kibawl ding hi. Tua ciangin keima hehna a thuak na hih lam uh na thei ding uh hi,” a hong ci hi.
verses.23: Topa in kei tungah thu hong gen a,
verses.24: “Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, Israel mite pen ka hehna hangin puah loin, a tungah guah ka zuksak lohna leitang tawh a kibatna uh amaute kiangah gen in.
verses.25: A uliante uh, ganhing a that humpinelkai hawk tawh kibang uh hi. Amaute in mi thatin, a sum le a neihsa khempeuh laksak uh a, a mi thahna hangun numei tampi tak meigong suaksak uh hi.
verses.26: A siampite un ka thukham palsatin, a siangtho biakna nate ninsak uh hi. A siangtho biakna nate le a mawkmawk nate khenna mel nei lo uh a, a tate uh tungah a siang le a nin a kilamdanna zong hilh lo uh hi. Sabbath-te zong donin nei lo uh hi. Tuate khempeuh hangin Israel mite in kei hong zahtak lo uh hi.
verses.27: A kumpi uliante uh, a sa mat sa uh a bal gawpgawp ngia hon tawh kibang uh hi. Sum ngah theih nadingin mi that uh hi.
verses.28: Kulh nin kimlai leikang tui tawh a kizut kang bangin a kamsangte un hih bang mawhnate imcip uh hi. A man lopi maang mu uh a, a man lopi-in mailam thu gen uh hi. Topa ahi keimah in amaute tungah thu gen lo napi-in, Topa Pasian in hih bangin thu gen hi, ci-in zuau phuakin mite tungah thu gen uh hi.
verses.29: Mi cithei a kineite in mi khemin a na sut uh hi. Mizawng mi cimawhte bawlsia-in, peemtate tungah nuamtak sa-in khualna mel nei loin a ututun gamta uh hi.
verses.30: Keimah in ka hehna tawh ka suksiat ding hun ciangin kulh a ciang zo ding, kulh a kicipna munah a cing zo ding le gam sung a hu zo ding mi khat amaute lakah ka zong a, ahi zongin tua bang ding mi khat beek ka mu zo kei hi.
verses.31: Tua ahih ciangin amauteʼ gamtatna tawh kizui-in gimpiakna-in amaute tungah ka hehna khahin, mei in a kat bangin amaute ka maimangsak ding hi, Topa Pasian in ci hi,” a hong ci hi.
